title: Re: Star Wars, through Chinese and back again
content:
"They want to know him at f***"
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img] I wonder how they got that translation.

There's this fun part.. Where Padme really says this: "Something wonderful has happened. Annie, i'm pregnant."
The translation says:
"Waiting for the happy event condescends to come. Dear, I was pregnant."You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
